short.vi: Tính tỉ số dự đoán khi xem trực tiếp bóng đá watch live football

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Calculate predicted scores when watching live football watch live football:

Welcome to the watch live football Chrome app! mbscore.tv ... This application helps you as a troll application to give random scores of matches like Chaco For Ever - Defensa y Justicia, Spain - Scotland, Netherlands - France, England - Australia, and many other matches.

Setting :

Open Chrome browser.
Visit the Chrome Web Store.
Search for "watch live football" in the search box. 
Select the "watch live football" widget and press the "Install" button.

Use:

Select the match you want to see fun predictions for from the list of available matches.
